data.prayer: Spirit, inspire new kinds of evangelism through social media in Reasi, Jammu and Kashmir, India.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist, discharge all the duties of your ministry.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Reasi, Jammu and Kashmir, India
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Please, teach the 190 believers in Reasi, Jammu and Kashmir, India how to pray to you and how to listen for your voice. That they might follow you into the good works you have prepared for them.
data.verse: My sheep listen to my voice; I know them, and they follow me.

data.prayer: Spirit, awaken the sleepers and call them to repent and be baptized in the county of Reasi. Set an urgency in their hearts.
data.verse: And now why do you wait? Rise and be baptized and wash away your sins, calling on his name.’

data.prayer: Spirit, cause the 190 believers in Reasi to obey with immediate, radical, costly obedience, like Abraham.
data.verse: Then God said, “Take your son, your only son, whom you love — Isaac — and go to the region of Moriah. Sacrifice him there as a burnt offering on a mountain I will show you.” Early the next morning Abraham got up and loaded his donkey. He took with him two of his servants and his son Isaac. When he had cut enough wood for the burnt offering, he set out for the place God had told him about.

data.prayer: Lord, you sent Jesus as a witness to testify about the light so that all the Rajput Halbani people might believe through him.
Father, let love abound more and more in the church of Reasi, Jammu and Kashmir, India.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight

data.prayer: Father, please give the people in the county of Reasi access to a Bible in their own language.

data.section_summary:
the county of Reasi, Jammu and Kashmir, India has a population of 17,300.

We estimate Reasi has 190 people who might know Jesus, 210 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 16,900 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 91 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, please defend the 190 believers in Reasi against self-centered spirituality. Open their eyes to the fields ripe for harvest around them.
